parameters:
It seems we have arrived at the deepest part of
the Larius Ruins, as a building is visible in
front of us.

We've somehow managed to make it this far. Now all
that's left is to find the demon and have them
lift the curse.
Well done for making it this far... humans...

Someone clad in a sinister aura has appeared. It's
probably the demon we've been looking for, without
a doubt.

I call out to Light, urging him to lift the curse
without showing any fear.

You foolish creatures who can't even see the true
nature of the curse... I'm sure you think the
same, Light.

Unfortunately, I'm completely clueless about this
curse, and it has caused a lot of trouble for many
people. I must find a way to lift it no matter
what.

I see... indeed, that's how it is... the passage
of time changes everything, whether it's something
with a form or something without.

You were no exception... that's all... It was
foolish of me to expect anything from humans...

...Hmph, there are no words to exchange at this
early stage.

It's the least I can do to show mercy. If you turn
back here, then so be it.

If you dare to appear before me again, I will
bestow a punishment more terrifying than death
upon you.

...Probably, the one from earlier is the demon
mentioned in the village legend...

Something seemed a little off. She was saying
something strange.

However, I can't just back down after coming this
far. I must find a way to lift Light's curse no
matter what.

Of course! No matter what difficulties there are,
I will definitely help you.

Thank you, both of you... I truly have good
friends

I renewed my determination to defeat the demon and
lift Light's curse no matter what...

It seems we have arrived at the deepest part of
the Larius Ruins, as a building is visible in
front of us.

We somehow managed to make it this far. Now all
that's left is to find the demon and have them
lift the curse.
Well done for making it this far...humans...

Someone clad in a sinister aura appears. It's
probably the demon we've been looking for, without
a doubt.

I call out to Light, urging him to lift the curse
without showing any signs of fear.

You...humans who can't even see the essence of the
curse...you must think you're foolish as well,
Light.

Unfortunately, I have no idea about this curse. It
has caused a lot of trouble for many people, and I
must find a way to lift it.

I see...indeed, that's how it is...the passage of
time changes everything, both the things that have
a form and those that do not.

You were no exception... that's all... it was
foolish of me to expect anything from humans...

...Hmph, there are no words to exchange at this
early stage.

At least it's a small mercy. If you were to turn
back here, then so be it.

If you were to appear before me again, I would
bestow a punishment more terrifying than death
upon you.

...Probably, the one from earlier is the demon
mentioned in the village's folklore...

A punishment more terrifying than death... doesn't
feel very pleasant.

However, I can't just back down after coming this
far. I must find a way to lift Light's curse no
matter what.
That's right, I'll stick with it until the end.

Thank you, both of you... I truly have good
friends

I renewed my determination to defeat the demon and
lift Light's curse no matter what...

It seems we have arrived at the deepest part of
the Larius Ruins, as a building is visible in
front of us.

Somehow we've managed to make it this far. Now all
that's left is to find the demon and have them
lift the curse.
Well done for making it this far... humans...

Someone clad in a sinister aura appears. It's
probably the demon we've been looking for, without
a doubt.

I call out to Light, urging him to lift the curse
without showing any fear.

You foolish creatures who can't even see the
essence of the curse... I'm sure you think the
same, Light.

Unfortunately, I'm completely clueless about this
curse, which has caused a lot of trouble for many
people. I must find a way to lift it no matter
what.

I see... indeed, that's how it is... the passage
of time changes everything, whether it's something
with a form or not.

You were no exception... that's all... It was
foolish of me to expect anything from humans...

...Hmph, there are no words to exchange at this
early stage.

It's the least I can do to show mercy. If you turn
back here, then so be it.

If you dare to appear before me again, I will give
you a punishment more terrifying than death.

...Probably, the one from earlier is the demon
mentioned in the village's folklore...

Just as feared, he looks like a villain at first
sight.

However, I can't just back down after coming this
far. I must find a way to lift Light's curse no
matter what.
That's right, I believe that \n[1] can do it!

Thank you, both of you... I truly have good
friends

I renewed my determination to defeat the demon and
lift Light's curse no matter what...

It seems we have arrived at the deepest part of
the Larius Ruins, as a building is visible in
front of us.

Somehow we've managed to make it this far. Now all
that's left is to find the demon and have them
lift the curse.
Well done for making it this far... humans...

Someone clad in a sinister aura appears. It's
probably the demon we've been looking for, without
a doubt.

...I call out to Light, urging him to lift the
curse without showing any fear.

Curse... You foolish creatures who can't even see
the essence of things, do you also think that
way... Light.

Unfortunately, I have no idea about this curse,
but it has caused a lot of trouble for many
people. I must find a way to lift it.

I see... indeed, that's how it is... the flow of
time changes everything, whether it be something
with a form or something without.

You were no exception... That's all... It was
foolish of me to expect anything from humans...

...Hmph, there are no words to exchange at this
early stage.
It would be a small mercy to turn back here.

If you were to appear before me again, I would
bestow a punishment more terrifying than death
upon you.

...Probably, the one from earlier is the demon
mentioned in the village's folklore...

Without a doubt, we must be prepared for a tough
battle against a formidable opponent.

However, we can't just back down after coming this
far. We must find a way to lift Light's curse no
matter what.

When \n[1] says that, it somehow makes me feel like
everything will be okay too.
Thank you... I truly have a good friend.

I renewed my determination to defeat the demon and
lift Light's curse no matter what...

It seems we have arrived at the deepest part of
the Larius Ruins, as a building is visible in
front of us.

We've somehow managed to make it this far. Now all
that's left is to find the demon and have them
lift the curse.
Well done for making it this far... humans...

Someone clad in a sinister aura appears. It's
probably the demon we've been looking for, without
a doubt.

I call out to Light, urging him to lift the curse
without showing any signs of fear.

You... are foolish creatures who cannot even see
the essence of the curse... I'm sure you think so
too, Light.
...Guh... That voice... I've heard it somewhere...

Light suddenly holds his head and crouches down on
the spot.

While supporting Light, who seems to have been
affected by the demon, I face the opponent.

...Hmph, don't look at me with that face. I
haven't done anything.

Even though you probably don't remember, such an
obvious attitude is irritating.

Not showing any reaction even after seeing those
two, I can predict the current situation...

Those two...? Are you talking about the bracelet
and necklace...? That's... right... something...

With something important... but... because it
wasn't there... mine...

Light's increasing suffering resembled the
symptoms that occurred frequently when he first
came to the village.

As time passed, the frequency decreased and it's
become rare to see it recently...

...Are you feeling unwell? It couldn't possibly be
my fault... No, it can't be...

Hmph, you shouldn't challenge me in that state.
Return to the village and regain your spirits.
Haa... haa... Wait, who are you...?
I'm sorry, it's my fault that the demon got away.

You shouldn't worry about that. More importantly,
is Light's condition okay?

Ah, it's calmed down quite a bit now. That thing
earlier was terrible...

I heard from the village chief that Light's
condition is related to memory impairment. Could
it be related to the current situation?

I don't know either... but the demon's voice...
and those two accessories, it's bothering me.

I feel like I'm about to remember something...
Sorry, \n[1].

If I can lift the curse with a smile and return to
peaceful days, my health will improve. There's no
need to apologize.

But, I can't help but feel that there's something
related to my past...

It seems we have arrived at the deepest part of
the Larius Ruins, as a building is visible in
front of us.

We've somehow managed to make it this far. Now all
that's left is to find the demon and have them
lift the curse.
Well done for making it this far... humans...

Someone clad in a sinister aura appears. It's
probably the demon we've been looking for, without
a doubt.

You're the demon who cursed Light! Thank you... I
won't forgive you!
Oh... there are so many of you... and this is...

You turned Light's dick into such a lovely...
terrifying thing... Truly demonic...

That's right! Making him release such thick cum is
really the best... and the worst!

Good grief... you all... Well, that's why I need
you to lift the curse!

I can't believe Light turned into such a
playboy... Ugh... it's giving me a headache...

I'm not sure, but it seems like the demon is
flinching!

...I'll let you off the hook for today. But I
won't go easy on you next time we meet...
Farewell!

...Probably, that guy from earlier is the demon
mentioned in the village legend...

Ehehe... Wow, the demon ran away. As expected of
Light!

I wonder if it's because Light is big, he stands
so solidly and looks cool.

Light was amazing! \n[1] was watching too! It's
kind of admirable, isn't it?

Thank you, everyone... Let's continue to lift the
curse, and then I'll find a way to thank you all.
There is one crystal placed in each map.

You can recover here, so please make use of it for
dungeon conquest.
